#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main(){
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    int n,q;
    while(t--){
        long long a[5000][2];
        cin >> n >> q;
        for(long i = 0 ; i < n ; i++){
            cin >> a[i][0] >> a[i][1];
        }
        long long time;
        for(int i = 0 ; i < q ; i++){
            cin >> time;
            int counter = 0;
            for(long i = 0 ; i < n ; i++){
                if(time >= a[i][0] && time <= a[i][1]){
                    cout << "NO\n";
                    counter = 1;
                    break;
                }
            }
            if(counter == 0){
                 cout << "YES\n";
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
